post.content:
하이구... 그렇게 자세하게 해주시면 좋긴 하지만.. 시간을 너무 할애 해서 대답 해주시면,, 다음엔 부담 시러워서..허허..

하옇튼 회장님 땡큐...


>I, myself, have a lot of questions like you do everyday.
>
>However, I dare to express my opinion to answer you question.
>
>1. First of all, that phrase implies that the food might NOT taste
>   good. (It might not taste good, but will try to eat it.. ?)
>   ( This is an assumption. )
>  
>   From my experience in this culture, it is NOT nice at all
>   to express your honest opinion in such a circumstance.
>
>2. No matter how bad it might taste, you are still supposed to say
>  
>  ' It looks delicious, I like it, It tastes so good,
>    I enjoyed the food very much,  what is the recipe ?  etc '
>
>   Use all possible nice words...
>
>3. Therefore I would not try to translate it because as soon as
>   you say that , you might lose a friend or thet become
>    less friendly to you.
>
>  (Or I can not visualize the exact circumstance at all. )
>  
> I hope it is some help to you.
>
> I look forward to seeing other opinions too.
>
> Thanks.
>
>
>>'정성을 보아서라도 맛있게 먹어주어야' 의 영어 표현은 어떻게 하는게
>>가장 적절한 가요?
>>
>>아시는분은...?
>>
>>앞으로는 이민자를 위한 영어 표현에 대한 질문 답변도 주고 받으면
>>참 좋을듯 합니다. 영어가 짧은 저로서도 필요 하죠.
>>
>>가끔은 사전이나 책에서 찾기 힘든 것들이 있죠.
>>
>
post.title: [re] [영어] \\'정성을 보아서라도\\' 의 영어 표현은?
